name: Coco Pops — Kellogg's — 400 g
ingredients:
Riz, sucre, chocolat (4%) (sucre, pâte de cacao), cacao maigre en poudre, sel, extrait de malt d'orge, arôme
Vitamines et Minéraux : carbonate de calcium, vitamines (PE B6, B2, Bl, B9, D, B12), fer.
additives:
E407a - Alga eucheuma trasformata



Alto rischio di sovraesposizione


Carbonato di calcio
Ferro
Nome generico: Grains de riz soufflés au chocolat enrichis en vitamines (B1, B2, PP, B6, B9, B12 et D) en calcium et en fer
Categorie: Cibi e bevande a base vegetale, Cibi a base vegetale, Breakfasts, Cereali e patate, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Puffed grains, Puffed cereals, Chocolate cereals, Puffed rice
